thread.title: Bay Area libraries team up to break record for shared reading

author: Lizzie Johnson
title: Bay Area libraries team up to break record for shared reading
text:
Photo: Nathaniel Y. Downes, The Chronicle Children’s librarian Timothy Troy reads at the San Francisco Main Library, which is promoting the literacy event. Children’s librarian Timothy Troy reads at the San Francisco Main...
In 2013, more than 2.4 million children and adults worldwide teamed up to achieve something big. Children’s librarian Timothy Troy reads at the San Francisco Main Library, which is promoting the literacy event. Children’s librarian Timothy Troy reads at the San Francisco Main...
